mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM HKBOARD ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT SEQ, ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE FROM HKBOARD WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HKBOARD(SEQ, ID, NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE) VALUES (HKBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{name},#{title},#{content},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE HKBOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
